result.title: An active support network of professionals
result.description:
2.5. An active support network of professionals. Working together during the Cross Visits will create a good relational basis for a network of professionals who continue to support each other in the execution of their action plans. This support is part of work package 3.
The deadline is changed because we needed more input to able to solved this task.
